description: Array A(x,y): concatenation of the binary expansions of x & y in such a way that 'y' is inserted after the least significant 1-bit of 'x', followed by the remaining 0-bits, if any. Listed antidiagonalwise as A(0,0), A(1,0), A(0,1), A(2,0), A(1,1), A(0,2), ... Zero is expanded as an empty string.
